results.content:
I really like this course. It was easy to follow and the instructor, Robert, was very confident, and he knew what he was talking about. This course alone, has taught me a lot about creating response web applications, and I feel like I have more confidence in writing my own web applications.

Can't wait to see more awesome courses from you, Robert.

EDIT: I just had a new at the new content, which has been added to this course. So happy it has been updated, as I really enjoyed it.

EDIT 2: I once again came back to this course, to check if there was anything new and I found some new content like how to use Flexbox and the restaurant example site. Like I said previously, this entire course, including the updates has exceeded my expectations.

Once again, good job Robert.
